name: Fantasy Costco
description:
You’re a tired and exhausted rogue traveling through a desert in search of an ancient trading post. Rumor has it, the trading post is filled with the rarest items in the land, and oh what you would do to steal something from it. On your quest to the elusive trading post will you be successful in your search, or will you discover another mystery to be unlocked?

Concept of Fantasy Costco is thanks to Griffin McElroy from The Adventure Zone: Balance!

There's 16 total items! Reroll to see if you can get them all!

Controls
SPACE - proceed text
Q - quit game
R - restart game at any time
G - restart gacha rolls

Music
Fantasy Costco Theme: Griffin McElroy (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yz5rDb7-kLk)
Stasis: Finval (https://tunetank.com/tracks/3802-stasis/)
